attributes.action: Stop the licensing of nudity in strip clubs in Brighton and Hove and prevent any further strip clubs opening
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As residents of Brighton and Hove we are concerned about the opening of fully nude strip clubs in our city and the moral and cultural detrimental effect this will have on our neighbourhood.  We believe strip clubs portray women as sex objects and this is not acceptable. The City Council should be given the power to be able to reject applications if they considered the number of strip clubs already in the area was adequate or granting a licence would be inappropriate due to the character of the area.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
